import json
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from copy import deepcopy

from maxaibase.model.H2O.h2o_classifier import H2OClassifierBaseModel
from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory
from maxairesources.logging.logger import get_logger
import pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T

from pysparkling.ml import H2OXGBoostClassifier

logger = get_logger(__name__)


[docs]@ModelFactory.register_model("H2OXGBClassifier")
class H2OXGBClassifier(H2OClassifierBaseModel):
    def __init__(self, id_col, target_col, params, param_grid):
        super().__init__()
        self.id_col = id_col
        self.target_col = target_col
        self.params = params
        self.param_grid = param_grid
        self.build(params)


[docs]    def build(self, params):
        self.model = H2OXGBoostClassifier(
            labelCol=self.target_col, **params
        )
        logger.info("model build successfull")
